page.title: 08FARMING
page.content: Surrounding Leyland is a large area of agricultural land and many farms.Farm machinery is often seen on the roads. Some of the farms around Leyland are Brookfold Farm,Cliffs Farm,Rose Hill Farm,Altcar Farm and Snubsnape Farm. Some of the farmhouses and farm buildings have been converted into homes. We visited{Snubsnape Farm}and asked the farmer some questions.The farmhouse is on Altcar Lane and was built in 1696.The farmer is called{Mr. {Tattersall}and his family has farmed there for 3 generations.He has three people working for him.He has 50 acres of land on which he grows barley and grass for hay and silage. He also keeps cows,sheep,pigs,geese and some horses. He would like money to grow wheat and for more machinery.
